item.title: [PI]Custom yell tags[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Wank Broham
item.description:
@Wank wrote:

Oh god, firstly lets use switch statements or something a little neater.

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[j];
switch (c.playerRights) {

	    case 0:
		  c2.sendMessage("");
                break;
	    case 1:
                     c2.sendMessage("");
                break;
                case 2:
                     c2.sendMessage("");
                break;
	}

}
[/code]

Seeing as we only use a single integer here (c.playerRights) it’s more effecient when we execute a switch than just using simple if-else statements, plus they’re horrendous. And to answer your question correctly, you would wanna

if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { c2.sendMessage(""); }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Custom yell tags[PI]
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

i was wondering how to add the exception of a single name into yell… i tried:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerNameEquals (“kyle”)){
c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[BitchOfServer]<img=0>"+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":"
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
}
if (c.playerRights == 1){

    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
   
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
  }[/code]

Read full topic
